title: Etekcity® 8GB Digital Rechargeable USB Audio Voice Recorder Flash Drive Mini Hidden Spy Pen Drive Disk 150 Hours
description: Product Description8GB USB Pen Drive Digital Audio Voice Recorder 150 Hours. Compatible with USB 2.0 and 3.0.
